summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3062, for the improvement of Avalon Way, from West Spokane Street to Yancy Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37121 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
